|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPC |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = T3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/12/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/NanoPC-T3 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;S5P6818;Nexell; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1WEPD-B031; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646D-BCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.07;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.172;Ubuntu 16.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), USB 2.0 (pins), SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4a, Bluetooth 4.0 LE, LVDS, MIPI DSI, 3.5mm audio output, microphone, DVP Camera Interface, MIPI CSI, RTC w/ battery backup, GPIO, heatsink, |addchip = 2K I2C EEPROM;Microchip;24AA025E48T-I/OT;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1;,,, Low Power Audio CODEC;Everest Semiconductor;ES8316;;1;,,, Single-Cell Li-Battery and Power Management IC;X-Powers;AXP228;;1;,,, 2.5A Adaptive COT Step Down Converter;ETA Solutions;ETA3451;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive OR Gate;Diodes Inc;74AHC1G32;;1;,,, 300mA LDO Regulator;Torex;XC6209E;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = pi |defaultpass = pi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 7, Armbian,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2016 |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BNVKPW3T |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1chip1modelfull = <!-- radio1 chip1 full info --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] ''Nexell'' S5P6818 @1.4GHz :Octa-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Onboard Storage: 8GB eMMC, SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM (2x [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646D) *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK AP6212]] ([[Broadcom]] BCM43430) â€¢ [http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/images/5/57/AP6212_V1.1_09022014.pdf Datasheet] *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG), 2x 4-pin USB 2.0
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPC-T3 ''NanoPC-T3'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/octa-core-cortex-a53-hacker-sbc-sells-for-60-dollars/ ''Octa-core Cortex-A53 hacker SBC sells for $60'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/04/29/nanopc-t3-octa-core-cortex-a53-single-board-computer-sells-for-60/ ''NanoPC-T3 Octa-core Cortex A53 Single Board Computer Sells for $60'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
